summary.span: 取得或設定資料行中資料的最大大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 資料行中資料的最大大小 (以位元組為單位)。

span.span: The maximum size, in bytes, of the data within the column.

value.span: 預設值是由參數值推斷。

span.span: The default value is inferred from the parameter value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性適用於二進位檔和字串型別。The property is used for binary and string types. 針對非字串資料類型和 ANSI 字串資料，屬性參考的位元組數目。For nonstring data types and ANSI string data, the property refers to the number of bytes. Unicode 字串資料，指的是字元數。For Unicode string data, refers to the number of characters. 字串的計數不包含結束的字元。The count for strings does not include the terminating character. 可變長度資料類型，說明資料傳輸到伺服器的最大數量。For variable-length data types, describes the maximum amount of data to transmit to the server. 例如，對於 Unicode 字串值，可用來限制傳送給伺服器，以第一次 100 個字元的資料量。For example, for a Unicode string value, could be used to limit the amount of data sent to the server to the first one hundred characters. 針對雙向和輸出參數和傳回值，您必須設定的值。For bidirectional and output parameters, and return values, you must set the value of . 這是不必要的輸入參數，並執行參數化陳述式時如果未明確設定，值會推斷從指定的參數的實際大小。This is not required for input parameters, and if not explicitly set, the value is inferred from the actual size of the specified parameter when a parameterized statement is executed. 並能夠推斷參數的屬性，請設定。The and properties of a parameter can be inferred by setting . 因此，您不需要加以指定。Therefore, you are not required to specify them. 不過，不會公開在屬性設定。However, they are not exposed in property settings. 例如，如果已推斷出參數的大小，陳述式執行之後未包含推斷的值。For example, if the size of the parameter has been inferred, does not contain inferred value after statement execution. 對於固定長度資料類型的值會被忽略。For fixed length data types, the value of is ignored. 它可以擷取僅供參考之用，並且會傳回的位元組的提供者會使用傳輸伺服器參數的值時的最大數量。It can be retrieved for informational purposes, and returns the maximum amount of bytes the provider uses when transmitting the value of the parameter to the server. 如果提供值的大小超過指定，則的將包含指定的值，大小截斷。If the size of the value supplied for a exceeds the specified , the of the will contain the specified value, truncated to the Size of the . 類型參數`DbType`。`String`，值是以 Unicode 字元的長度。For parameters of type `DbType`.`String`, the value of is length in Unicode characters. 類型參數`DbType`。`Xml`，會被忽略。For parameters of type `DbType`.`Xml`, is ignored.

summary.span: 取得或設定來源資料行的名稱，這個資料行對應至 ，並用來載入或傳回 。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the source column mapped to the and used for loading or returning the .

value.span: 對應至 的來源資料行名稱。

span.span: The name of the source column mapped to the .
The default is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設為空字串，參數的值以外的資料行從擷取的任何項目名稱。When is set to anything other than an empty string, the value of the parameter is retrieved from the column with the name. 如果設定為`Input`，值取自。If is set to `Input`, the value is taken from the . 如果設為`Output`，該值為擷取自資料來源。If is set to `Output`, the value is taken from the data source. A的`InputOutput`是兩者的組合。A of `InputOutput` is a combination of both. 如需有關如何使用屬性，請參閱 < [DataAdapter 的參數](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md)並[使用 Dataadapter 更新資料來源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)。For more information about how to use the property, see [DataAdapter Parameters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataadapter-parameters.md) and [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md).

summary.span: 設定或取得值，這個值表示來源資料行是否可為 Null。

span.span: Sets or gets a value which indicates whether the source column is nullable.

summary.span: 這可讓 正確產生可為 Null 的資料行的 Update 陳述式。

span.span: This allows to correctly generate Update statements for nullable columns.

value.span: 如果來源資料行可為 Null，則為 ；否則為 。

span.span: if the source column is nullable; if it is not.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會使用正確處理可為 null 的資料行時，產生更新命令。 is used by the to correctly generate update commands when dealing with nullable columns. 一般而言，使用限制為繼承自的開發人員。Generally, use of is limited to developers inheriting from . 使用這個屬性來判斷來源資料行是否可為 null，並將此屬性設定為`true`它是否可為 null，和`false`如果不是。 uses this property to determine whether the source column is nullable, and sets this property to `true` if it is nullable, and `false` if it is not. 當是要產生其 Update 陳述式，它會檢查每個參數。When is generating its Update statement, it examines the for each parameter. 如果屬性是`true`，產生 WHERE 子句，如下所示 （在這個查詢運算式中，"FieldName"代表欄位的名稱）：If the property is `true`, generates a WHERE clauses like the following (in this query expression, "FieldName" represents the name of the field): ``` ((@IsNull_FieldName = 1 AND FieldName IS NULL) OR (FieldName = @Original_FieldName)) ``` 如果欄位是`false`，會產生下列 WHERE 子句：If for the field is `false`, generates the following WHERE clause: ``` FieldName = @OriginalFieldName ``` 颾魤 ㄛ@IsNull_FieldName包含 1，如果來源欄位中包含 null，而 0 則。In addition, @IsNull_FieldName contains 1 if the source field contains null, and 0 if it does not. 這項機制可讓 SQL Server 中的效能最佳化，並提供適用於多個提供者的通用程式碼。This mechanism allows for a performance optimization in SQL Server, and provides for common code that works across multiple providers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 供期間運算，判斷是否要將參數值設定為`Current`或`Original`。Used by during an operation to determine whether the parameter value is set to `Current` or `Original`. 這可讓更新的主索引鍵。This lets primary keys be updated. 此屬性設定為新版供`DataRow.Item`屬性，或方法物件。This property is set to the version of the used by the `DataRow.Item` property, or the method of the object.

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the parameter.
An that is the value of the parameter.
The default value is null.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 輸入參數的值繫結至傳送到伺服器。For input parameters, the value is bound to the that is sent to the server. 輸出和傳回值參數，此值設定完成和已關閉。For output and return value parameters, the value is set on completion of the and after the is closed. 當您將 null 參數值傳送至伺服器時，您必須指定、 不是 null。When you send a null parameter value to the server, you must specify , not null. 系統中的 Null 值是沒有值的空物件。The null value in the system is an empty object that has no value. 用於表示 null 值。 is used to represent null values. 如果應用程式指定的資料庫型別，繫結的值會轉換成該類型，提供者將資料傳送到伺服器時。If the application specifies the database type, the bound value is converted to that type when the provider sends the data to the server. 提供者會嘗試將值的任何類型的轉換，如果它支援介面。The provider tries to convert any type of value if it supports the interface. 如果指定的型別不相容的值，可能會導致轉換錯誤。Conversion errors may result if the specified type is not compatible with the value. 屬性可以設定的值推斷而來。The property can be inferred by setting the Value. 屬性會覆寫`DbDataAdapter.Update`。The property is overwritten by `DbDataAdapter.Update`.

span.span: ADO.NET Overview
